li.p: to make a binary distinction between liabilities and equity;
to define equity as the residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities; and

not to discuss what forms of presentation and disclosure are appropriate if an entity’s equity comprises different classes of equity claims and different components of equity (see paragraphs 7.12–7.13).
